attributes.additional_details:
There are children and people on benefits that are getting themself pregnent and having more and more kids just so that can get more benefits so they can have a easy life without working.

First of all if you are on benefits you shouldnt be allowed to have a child. If you cant get a job and afford to feed yourself then you cant aford to rise a kid.

If your out of work you should not be given benefits for a second child. I belive this would stop people having more and more kids that they cant rise properly just so they have more money that they havnt earned
